channel.title: Expense Tracker Updates
channel.description: Product and content updates for Expense Tracker - a free, privacy-first personal finance tool.

item.title: GEO optimization and AI-ready summary
item.description: Added AI-friendly summaries, updated FAQs, and clarified privacy and trust sections for better AI search visibility.

item.title: SEO and structured data improvements
item.description: Added FAQPage schema, WebApplication schema, breadcrumb structured data, and keyword metadata for improved search engine visibility.

item.title: Site launch
item.description: Latest updates to the Expense Tracker site.
